parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return true if multiPlayer.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isMultiplayer'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>if (isMultiplayer) then {
	//...block
}</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isDedicated]], [[isServer]]
</value></part></template>
